name: Primitivity
description: '''Primitivity''' is an American instrumental [[cello rock]] band consisting of three cellists and a percussionist. Primitivity began primarily as a cover band playing songs by the thrash metal band [[Megadeth]] and the cello rock band [[Apocalyptica]]. The band has released one album entirely of [[Megadeth]] covers titled ''[[Plays Megadeth For Cello]]''. Primitivity has also composed and performed original songs for [[cello rock]] ensemble. The group was selected as a 2010 Artist In Residence at [[Strathmore Hall]] in [[Bethesda, Maryland]].
